rules.formula: ( ISCHANGED( X100_Onboarding_Date__c ) && ISBLANK( X100_Onboarding_Date__c ) ) || ( ISCHANGED( Approved_to_move_w_o_100__c ) && ISBLANK( Approved_to_move_w_o_100__c ) )
( ISCHANGED( X100_Onboarding_Date__c ) && NOT( ISBLANK( X100_Onboarding_Date__c )) ) || ( ISCHANGED( Approved_to_move_w_o_100__c ) && NOT( ISBLANK( Approved_to_move_w_o_100__c )) )

rules.formula:
AND
(
PRIORVALUE (No_Start_Client__c)= TRUE, ISCHANGED (No_Start_Client__c ), ISPICKVAL ( Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved") || ISPICKVAL ( Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved to Self-Retain")|| ISPICKVAL ( Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved Dual Bands")|| ISPICKVAL ( Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved as an Add-On Exception")|| ISPICKVAL ( Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved as a Name/Fed ID/Ownership Change") )

rules.description: when the user fills in the Employees Loaded date, the user's name is placed into the Employees Loaded By field.
when the user fills in the Employee Audit & Corrected date, the user's name is placed into the Employee audit & Corrected By field.

rules.formula: $RecordType.Name = "PEO New Business Onboarding" && Pass_to_New_Loads__c && Not(IsBlank(Client_Processed__c)) && Ready_for_Payroll_Turnover__c && Not(IsBlank(Payroll_Specialist__c)) && No_Start_Client__c = False && (AND(IsPickVal(Medical_Option__c, "PBS Medical"), Benefit_Turnover_Complete__c, Ready_to_Run_with_Payroll__c) || (Not(IsPickVal( Medical_Option__c , "PBS Medical"))))

When the Loader is populated this will put a date
When the date in field [Approved to move w/o 100%] is populated or edited, put in the username in the Manager Approved By field
Populates Onboarding Complete Actual once total web open holds= 0 and pass to new loads equals true
When data is entered or changed in field [Onboarding Spreadsheet Received], enter a date in Onbrdg Spreadsheet Rec

rules.fullName: Populate Pass to New Biz Web Based
rules.description: Populates Pass to New Biz when contractually complete actual, Workers Comp UW Approval Actual, Medical/UW Ancillary UW Approval and Onboarding Complete Actual all have dates

rules.fullName: Populate Pass to new Biz Milestone
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 10 AND 2 AND 3 AND ( 4 OR 5) AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10)

criteriaItems.value: Has Protection Plus,End Date Completed,INC Submitted Parent/Child,Old Client- Prior to Product

rules.description: When Payroll NCS is populated, put today's date in Payroll NCS Assigned.
When Prior Wages Received is populated, enter today's date in Prior Wages Rcvd.
When [shell audit & corrected] has a date entered and [Employees Audit & corrected] has a date in it

rules.fullName: Populate Ready to Process Payroll Milestone
rules.description: Populate the Ready to Process Payroll-Milestone date field when both the Ready to Process Payroll and Ready to Run with Payroll fields have been checked, using the most recent date.

criteriaItems.value: Self Retained WC,WCPS,SR NO WC COI

rules.description: If the field [Workers Compensation Type] = Self Retained WC, WCPS or SR NO WC COI
When Contacted Agency to Confirm Setup Date or Workers Compensation Loaded have been populated, put today's date in WC Setup

rules.fullName: Populate Web Open Holds Cleared Actual
rules.description: Populates Web Open Holds Cleared actual once total web open holds= 0 and initial EE Data File Received has a value

rules.fullName: Populate the WC Underwriting Review Complete with Current Date of Workers compensation type is SR No WC COI%2E
rules.description: Used for paper based onboarding. Populate WC Underwriting Review Complete when Final WC Approval Complete is populated or WC type = SR NO WC COI
rules.formula:
($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PEO_Paper_Based_Onboarding' || RecordTypeId = "0120g000000grzo"
|| RecordTypeId = "012700000001jeX") && (ISCHANGED(Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK(Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c ))) || (ISCHANGED(Workers_Compensation_Type__c) && ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c, 'SR NO WC COI'))

rules.fullName: Ready to Process Payroll Milestone New Onboarding Populate

rules.description: Removes date when Final EE Data File Received is blank

rules.description: Removes date in Initial EE Data File Actual when Initial EE Data File Received is blank

rules.fullName: Remove No start date web and new business close date web
rules.description: Removes the date in the no start date field and new business close date when no start client = false
Removes date in onbaording complete actual when total web open holds is not equal to 0 or pass to new loads equals false

rules.fullName: Remove Pass to New Biz Web Based
rules.description: Removes Pass to New Biz when any of the following fields are blank: contractually complete actual, Workers Comp UW Approval Actual, Medical/UW Ancillary UW Approval and Onboarding Complete Actual

rules.fullName: Remove Web Open Holds Cleared Actual
rules.description: Removes date in web open holds cleared actual when total web open holds is not equal to 0 or initial EE Data file Received is blank

rules.description: Evaluate the rule when a record is created, and any time it's edited to subsequently meet criteria

rules.fullName: Sent to WC UW Time %28to remove date%2Ftime%29

criteriaItems.value: PEO Web Based Onboarding,PEO Paper Based Onboarding

rules.fullName: Set Prior wages received to Blank
rules.description: If the value in the PEO068 Selection field changes from "N/A" or "Refuse" to "Accept" then we want the date in the field Prior wages received to be removed.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( PEO068_Selection__c ), ISPICKVAL( PEO068_Selection__c , 'Accept'), OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(PEO068_Selection__c ), 'N/A' ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(PEO068_Selection__c ), 'Refuse' )))

rules.fullName: Set Prior wages received to Today
rules.description: Auto populate 'Prior Wages' with today's date when the field called PEO068 Selection gets a value of "N/A" or "Refuse" entered
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( PEO068_Selection__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL( PEO068_Selection__c , 'N/A' ), ISPICKVAL( PEO068_Selection__c , 'Refuse' )))

rules.description: This will provide the date timestamp of when the field Onboarding Spreadsheet Received has a date entered.
If the date in the Spreadsheet Received is ever removed we removed Spreadsheet Rec Time.
